snippet.title: RIGS Mechanized Combat League | Sentinel Reveal Trailer | PlayStation VR
snippet.description:
Check out some of the RIGS you’ll be able to pilot in RIGS Mechanized Combat League – including those in the new hard-hitting Sentinel class. Opening day is October 13, so make sure you pre-order your copy now.

RIGS Mechanized Combat League comes to PlayStation VR on 13th October. Find out more: http://bit.ly/2bB3RlO

Preorder now: http://bit.ly/2cMZeBs
